name: Kitty Calamity
description:
Kitty's are dropping from the sky! Save us from a Kitty Calamity!

Miss 1 Kitty and its GAME OVER!

This is a very simple prototype / game loop inspired by one of my Twitch Subscribers as part of my "GAMIFY A SUB" streams.

There may be updates down the line but this was mostly in the spirit of a 3-4 hour game jam.

I hope you enjoy and look forward to any feedback you may have :)

CONTROLS
Left Mouse Button = Stop Kitty's Falling & Navigate Menus
